properties.name: sessionUserAttribute
properties.label: Session user attribute
properties.description: Session attribute to capture as the user of the trace. Traces can be filtered by user in the explorer. Nested paths are supported, e.g. something.user.username. The attribute value is converted into a String if necessary via toString(). The special attribute name '::id' can be used to refer to the http session id.

properties.name: captureSessionAttributes
properties.label: Session attributes
properties.description: Comma-separated list of servlet session attributes to capture in the root trace entry. Nested paths are supported, e.g. mainObject.nestedObject.displayName. '*' at the end of a path is supported, e.g. mainObject.nestedObject.*, meaning capture all properties of mainObject.nestedObject (via reflection, looking at methods that begin with "get[A-Z]" or "is[A-Z]"). '*' by itself means capture all session attributes. Values are converted into Strings if necessary via toString(). The special attribute name '::id' can be used to refer to the http session id.

properties.name: captureRequestParameters
properties.label: Capture request parameters
properties.description: Comma-separated list of request parameters to capture in the root trace entry. The wildcard '*' is supported anywhere in the parameter.

properties.name: maskRequestParameters
properties.label: Mask request parameters
properties.description: Comma-separated list of sensitive request parameters to mask, e.g. passwords. The wildcard '*' is supported anywhere in the parameter.

properties.name: captureRequestHeaders
properties.label: Capture request headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of request headers to capture in the root trace entry. The wildcard '*' is supported anywhere in the parameter.

properties.name: captureRequestRemoteAddr
properties.label: Capture request remote address
properties.description: Capture request remote address using ServletRequest.getRemoteAddr().

properties.name: captureRequestRemoteHost
properties.label: Capture request remote host
properties.description: Capture request remote host using ServletRequest.getRemoteHost().

properties.name: captureResponseHeaders
properties.label: Capture response headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of response headers to capture in the root trace entry. The wildcard '*' is supported anywhere in the parameter.

properties.name: traceErrorOn4xxResponseCode
properties.label: Error on 4xx
properties.checkboxLabel: Mark trace as error on 4xx response code
properties.description: Mark the trace as an error when a 4xx response code is returned.
